data_description.npsso: The NPSSO token is generated upon successful login of your PlayStation Network account and is used to authenticate your requests within Home Assistant.

user.description: To obtain your NPSSO token, log in to your [PlayStation account]({psn_link}) first. Then [click here]({npsso_link}) to retrieve the token.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate {name} with PlayStation Network
reauth_confirm.description: The NPSSO token for **{name}** has expired. To obtain a new one, log in to your [PlayStation account]({psn_link}) first. Then [click here]({npsso_link}) to retrieve the token.

abort.already_configured_as_subentry: Already configured as a friend for another account. Delete the existing entry first.
abort.unique_id_mismatch: The provided NPSSO token corresponds to the account {wrong_account}. Please re-authenticate with the account **{name}**

user.title: Friend online status
user.description: Track the online status of a PlayStation Network friend.

data_description.account_id: Select a friend from your friend list to track their online status.

abort.already_configured_as_entry: Already configured as a service. This account cannot be added as a friend.
abort.already_configured: Already configured as a friend in this or another account.
abort.no_friends: Looks like your friend list is empty right now. Add friends on PlayStation Network first.

not_ready.message: Authentication to the PlayStation Network failed.

update_failed.message: Data retrieval failed when trying to access the PlayStation Network.

group_invalid.message: Failed to send message to group {name}. The group is invalid or does not exist.

send_message_forbidden.message: Failed to send message to {name}. You are not allowed to send messages to this group or friend.

send_message_failed.message: Failed to send message to {name}. Try again later.

user_profile_private.message: Unable to retrieve data for {user}. Privacy settings restrict access to activity.

user_not_found.message: Unable to retrieve data for {user}. User does not exist or has been removed.

group_chat_forbidden.title: Failed to retrieve group chats for {name}
group_chat_forbidden.description:
The PlayStation Network integration was unable to retrieve group chats for **{name}**.

This is likely due to insufficient permissions (Error: `{error_message}`).

To resolve this issue, please ensure the account's chat and messaging feature is not restricted by parental controls or other privacy settings.

If the restriction is intentional, you can safely ignore this message.
